login_subtitle: Sign in to continue your sports journey

UserProfile.password_invalid: يجب أن تحتوي كلمة المرور على حرف كبير واحد على الأقل، وحرف صغير واحد، ورقم واحد. يجب أن تكون كلمة المرور بين 8 و20 حرفًا.

hero_description: ArenaBook provides you with the best arena booking experience. Search, compare, and book in minutes with simple and secure steps.
features_subtitle: We provide you with the best arena booking experience with advanced features and excellent customer service
feature_diverse_arenas_desc: Discover a wide range of arenas for different sports. Choose what suits your needs.
feature_secure_payment_desc: Enjoy a safe and reliable payment process through multiple electronic payment gateways.
feature_fast_booking_desc: Book your favorite arena with simple and quick steps, avoiding long waiting times.
feature_24_7_desc: Book at any time of the day, ArenaBook is always available to serve you.
feature_community_desc: Join an active sports community and share your experience with other players.
feature_guarantee_desc: All arenas are certified and quality-assured to ensure an excellent experience.
how_it_works_subtitle: Simple steps to book your favorite arena in minutes
how_it_works_step1_desc: Use the search engine to find available arenas in your area
how_it_works_step2_desc: Select the date and time that suit you from the schedule
how_it_works_step3_desc: Complete the secure payment process through electronic payment gateways
how_it_works_step4_desc: Receive booking confirmation via email and text messages
testimonials_subtitle: Thousands of users trust us to book their favorite arenas
testimonial_text_1: Excellent support and smooth process. I no longer find it difficult to book my favorite arenas. Great experience!
testimonial_text_2: Great interface and a large selection of arenas. Highly recommend it to any athlete looking for easy booking.
testimonial_text_3: ArenaBook has completely changed the way I book arenas! Fast, easy, and secure. The best booking platform I've used.
cta_title: Ready to Start Booking Your Favorite Arena?
cta_description: Join thousands of users who trust us to book their favorite arenas. Start now and enjoy the best booking experience.
footer_description: The #1 arena booking platform. Book your favorite arena easily and quickly.
reservations_error_load: An error occurred while loading reservations
